description.narrative: Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. The expected results of the project will be: 1) A significant strengthening of the Phillippine fishing industry focusing on sustainability and efficiency, 2) Improved competitiveness and increased independence for the Phillippine fishing industry, 3) Jobs created in both Denmark and the Phillippines, 4) Increased trade between Denmark and the Phillippines.

The main purpose of the project will be to develop and adapt a pelagic (midwater trawling) fishing model for the local conditions and fishing vessel containing equipment to be procured, training to be transferred as well as know how and methods to be implemented.
